description:
Reffettorio Paris is a cultural and artistic initiative that operates as a solidarity restaurant. The project aims to provide high-quality meals to individuals in vulnerable or precarious situations, referred to as "guests." The restaurant serves semi-gastronomic meals prepared by volunteer chefs, focusing on dignity and conviviality by offering a seated dining experience rather than traditional soup kitchen-style service.

Beyond meal provision, Reffettorio Paris also engages in educational activities, offering workshops and cultural visits to museums, thereby intertwining food with art. The initiative relies on a network of over 450 associations, private sponsors, and volunteers, fostering a community spirit while addressing the growing issue of food insecurity. The project aims to restore dignity to its guests through the experience of enjoying gourmet meals in a restaurant setting, while also tackling the challenges of funding and resource management in the face of increasing demand for food aid.
name: Refettorio
